description: Try our easy to follow Fettuccine Alfredo With Mushrooms recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Fettuccine Alfredo With Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta as per pack instructions until al dente. Drain. Return to pan. Add cream and parmesan. Toss to combine.

Meanwhile, heat butter and oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Add mushrooms and cook, tossing frequently, for 10 minutes or until all liquid has evaporated and mushrooms are golden. Add to pasta along with chives. Season and toss well. Serve topped with extra parmesan.
